author: timbeiko
content: A few of us were discussing EIP-4488 on a call this AM, and I think there are a lot of things that would benefit from active conversation this week. I propose we use <#751450632543535236> to chat about it. Ethereum Magicians works well for slower, longer, discourse, but hopefully discord can help go over some issues a bit more efficiently, given we have a short window to make a decision about it.
